Class CustomerView

    • View.CustomerView

  • public class CustomerView
extends java.lang.Object
    CustomerView Class includes the visual interaction with the customer (= User interface)
    Author:
    JH & GM

    • Method Detail

      • getCustomerDetails

        public Customer getCustomerDetails()
        Method gets Customer details by the input from the customer. The values of all Strings are returned via the object C.
        Returns:
        C

      • getProductChoice

        public int getProductChoice()
        Method asking the customer for the bike type. The customer can choose between Normal Bike and Electric Bike
        Returns:
        int productchoice

      • printBikes

        public static void printBikes(java.util.ArrayList<?> arrayBikes)
        Method to print out a table of all available bikes from the passed ArrayList called arrayBikes. It is passed an ArrayList of generic Objects. There are different things checked before the bikes are printed out. Firstly, if the passed ArrayList is an instance of ElectricBikes then there is a different printout Format compared to normal bikes.
        Parameters:
        arrayBikes -

      • getBikeRentalChoice

        public int getBikeRentalChoice(boolean normalBike)
                        throws java.io.IOException,
                               java.lang.InterruptedException
        Method to choose a specific bike. Customer inputs a specific bike ID provided in the list of available bikes. When the customer inserts 0, he/she is again forwarded to the Bike Type menu. This method also handles two exceptions: If the customer enters an ID that is too high or too low, then the IndexOutofBound exception is handled. The same happens if the customer enters a String. The try catch statement is integrated into a do-while loop and only becomes true/exits the loop in case the input is okay. This guarantees that the program will continue to run, even though the customer enters an invalid input.
        Returns:
        int bikeID
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - 1
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • bikeChoiceConfirmation

        public void bikeChoiceConfirmation(boolean normalBike)
                            throws java.io.IOException,
                                   java.lang.InterruptedException
        This method asks the customer to confirm his/her choice of bike and offers 4 different menu options: 1) Bike selection is confirmed and the customer is directed to the payment. 2) Bike selection is annulled and the customer can select another bike ID. 3) Bike selection is annulled and the customer can select another bike type (Electric or Normal). 0) Customer exits the system and cancel the selection process. This method also handles the InputMismatchException in case the customer enters a String instead of an integer. There is no need to also handle the IndexOutOfBounds exception as above in the getBikeRentalChoice() method, because the input does not refer to an ArrayList.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.Exception

      • printBikeReceipt

        public void printBikeReceipt(boolean normalOrElectric,
                             int pick)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Method to print out the receipt after the payment has been successfully processed. The customer can see that the his/her card has been charged and which bike he/she has finally rented out. The respective receipt is printed based on the passed parameters like the boolean normalOrElectric and the int pick, representing the bikeID.
        Parameters:
        pick -
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • rentAnotherBike

        public void rentAnotherBike()
                     throws java.io.IOException,
                            java.lang.InterruptedException
        This method appears at the end of the booking receipt and lets the user choose to exit or book another bike. If customer chooses to rent another bike the productBooking method is called. This lets the user go through the booking process again. If the user chooses to exit the system he/she receives a motivational quote and is good to go for his/her bike riding experience.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.InterruptedException
